_header: Saint Mark the gospeller says us
_description: Gospel for the Seventh Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Mark þe gospellere seiþ vsþat muchel folk was
                    wiþ Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Where al þat Ioye schal spredeAnd euere lyue and neuer
                    dede. AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Cum turba multa esset cum Ihesu (f. 201ra)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Marke þe gospellere saise vsþat mikil folk folowid
                    iesus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde iesus to heuene vs ledeAnd wiþ his fase he
                    þare vs fede . amen .
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Mark þe gospellere sais vsþat mekil folk was with
                    ihesus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde ihesu til heuene vs ledeAnd with his face vs alle
                    þare fede
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica viia post festum trinitatis secundum Marcum (p.
                    242)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt mark þe Gospellere seyth vsþat mekil folk was
                    wiþ ihesusIn to wildernes þei folewid him…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…And wiþ thi face so vs þu fedeþat we may lyue
                    & neuere ben dede
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica 7a post festum sancte trinitatis Euangelium secundum
                        Marcum (f. 153v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Sayne marke þe gospeller says vsþat mykyll folk was with
                    ihesus…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Oure lord ihesu tyll heuen vs ledeAnd with hym selfen
                    þare vs fede
CULGg531.Attributed Title: Þis es þe gospell of þe seuent sonunday (f. 102)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
SEint Mark þe gospeler seiþ vsÞat muchel folk was
                    with Ihesus…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Wher al þat Ioye schal spredeAnd euer lyue & neuere
                    dede. Amen
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title: Cum turba multa esset cum Ihesu (f. 6ra)
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Marke þe gospeller sais vsThat mikill folke followid
                    Ihesus…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Our lorde Ihesu to heuen vs ledeAnd with his face he
                    þair vs sede

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint Mark þe gospelere sayth vsÞat moche folke wos with
                    iesusIn wildernys þay foluyd hymAnd had defavte of met a
                    tym…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Ihesu loueryd to heuyn vs ledeAnd with his fase þare vs
                    fede

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Marke þe gospellere says vsþat mykyll folke was
                    with ihesus…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde ihesu tyll heuen vs ledeand with hys fayre face vs
                    fede
